member.name: T:Nessos.LinqOptimizer.CSharp.Extensions
member.summary: Provides a set of static methods for querying objects that implement IQueryExpr.

member.summary: Enables the optimization of a query.

member.param: An IEnumerable to convert to an IQueryExpr.
member.returns: A query that returns the elements of the source sequence.

member.returns: A Func containing optimized code.

member.summary: Creates a new query that projects each element of a sequence into a new form.
member.typeparam: The type of the elements of the query.
The type of the value returned by selector.
member.param: A query whose values to invoke a transform function on.
A transform function to apply to each element.
member.returns: A query whose elements will be the result of invoking the transform function on each element of source.

member.name: M:Nessos.LinqOptimizer.CSharp.Extensions.Select``2(Nessos.LinqOptimizer.Base.IQueryExpr{System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``0}},System.Linq.Expressions.Expression{System.Func{``0,System.Int32,``1}})
member.summary: Creates a new query that projects each element of a sequence into a new form by incorporating the element's index.
member.typeparam: The type of the elements of source.
The type of the value returned by selector.
member.param: A query whose values to invoke a transform function on.
A transform function to apply to each source element; the second parameter of the function represents the index of the source element.
member.returns: A query whose elements will be the result of invoking the transform function on each element of source.

member.name: M:Nessos.LinqOptimizer.CSharp.Extensions.Where``1(Nessos.LinqOptimizer.Base.IQueryExpr{System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``0}},System.Linq.Expressions.Expression{System.Func{``0,System.Boolean}})
member.summary: Creates a new query that filters a sequence of values based on a predicate.
member.typeparam: The type of the elements of source.
member.param: An query whose values to filter.
A function to test each element for a condition.
member.returns: A query that contains elements from the input query that satisfy the condition.

member.name: M:Nessos.LinqOptimizer.CSharp.Extensions.Where``1(Nessos.LinqOptimizer.Base.IQueryExpr{System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``0}},System.Linq.Expressions.Expression{System.Func{``0,System.Int32,System.Boolean}})
member.summary: Creates a new query that filters a sequence of values based on a predicate. Each element's index is used in the logic of the predicate function.
member.typeparam: The type of the elements of query.
member.param: An query whose values to filter.
A function to test each source element for a condition; the second parameter of the function represents the index of the source element.
member.returns: A query that contains elements from the input query that satisfy the condition.

member.name: M:Nessos.LinqOptimizer.CSharp.Extensions.Aggregate``2(Nessos.LinqOptimizer.Base.IQueryExpr{System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``0}},``1,System.Linq.Expressions.Expression{System.Func{``1,``0,``1}})
member.summary: Creates a new query that applies an accumulator function over a sequence. The specified seed value is used as the initial accumulator value.
member.typeparam: The type of the elements of source.
The type of the accumulator value.
member.param: An query whose values are used to aggregate over.
The initial accumulator value.
An accumulator function to be invoked on each element.
member.returns: A query that returns the final accumulator value.

member.name: M:Nessos.LinqOptimizer.CSharp.Extensions.Sum(Nessos.LinqOptimizer.Base.IQueryExpr{System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Double}})
member.summary: Creates a new query that computes the sum of a sequence of Double values.
member.param: A query whose sequence of Double values to calculate the sum of.
member.returns: A query that returns the sum of the values in the sequence.

member.summary: Creates a new query that computes the sum of a sequence of Long values.
member.param: A query whose sequence of Long values to calculate the sum of.
member.returns: A query that returns the sum of the values in the sequence.

member.summary: Creates a new query that computes the sum of a sequence of int values.
member.param: A query whose sequence of int values to calculate the sum of.
member.returns: A query that returns the sum of the values in the sequence.

member.name: M:Nessos.LinqOptimizer.CSharp.Extensions.Count``1(Nessos.LinqOptimizer.Base.IQueryExpr{System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``0}})
member.summary: Creates a new query that returns the number of elements in a sequence.
member.typeparam: The type of the elements of source.
member.param: A query whose elements will be count.
member.returns: A query that returns the number of elements in the input sequence.

member.name: M:Nessos.LinqOptimizer.CSharp.Extensions.SelectMany``2(Nessos.LinqOptimizer.Base.IQueryExpr{System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``0}},System.Linq.Expressions.Expression{System.Func{``0,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``1}}})
member.summary: Creates a new query that projects each element of a sequence to an IEnumerable and flattens the resulting sequences into one sequence.
member.typeparam: The type of the elements of source.
The type of the elements of the sequence returned by selector.
member.param: A query whose values to project.
A transform function to apply to each element.
member.returns: A query whose elements are the result of invoking the one-to-many transform function on each element of the input sequence.

member.name: M:Nessos.LinqOptimizer.CSharp.Extensions.SelectMany``3(Nessos.LinqOptimizer.Base.IQueryExpr{System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``0}},System.Linq.Expressions.Expression{System.Func{``0,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``1}}},System.Linq.Expressions.Expression{System.Func{``0,``1,``2}})
member.summary: Creates a query that projects each element of a sequence to an IEnumerable, flattens the resulting sequences into one sequence, and invokes a result selector function on each element therein.
member.typeparam: The type of the elements of source.
The type of the intermediate elements collected by collectionSelector.
The type of the elements of the sequence returned by selector.
member.param: A query whose values to project.
A transform function to apply to each element of the input sequence.
A transform function to apply to each element of the intermediate sequence.
member.returns: A query whose elements are the result of invoking the one-to-many transform function on each element of the input sequence and the result selector function on each element therein.

member.name: M:Nessos.LinqOptimizer.CSharp.Extensions.Take``1(Nessos.LinqOptimizer.Base.IQueryExpr{System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``0}},System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a query that returns a specified number of contiguous elements from the start of a sequence.
member.typeparam: The type of the elements of source.
member.param: The query to return elements from.
The number of elements to return.
member.returns: A query that returns a sequence containing the specified number of elements from the start of the input sequence.

member.name: M:Nessos.LinqOptimizer.CSharp.Extensions.TakeWhile``1(Nessos.LinqOptimizer.Base.IQueryExpr{System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``0}},System.Linq.Expressions.Expression{System.Func{``0,System.Boolean}})
member.summary: Creates a query that returns elements from a sequence as long as a specified condition is true, and then skips the remaining elements.
member.typeparam: The type of the elements of source.
member.param: The query to return elements from.
A function to test each element for a condition.
member.returns: A query that contains the elements from the input sequence that occur before the element at which the test no longer passes.

member.name: M:Nessos.LinqOptimizer.CSharp.Extensions.SkipWhile``1(Nessos.LinqOptimizer.Base.IQueryExpr{System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``0}},System.Linq.Expressions.Expression{System.Func{``0,System.Boolean}})
member.summary: Creates a query that bypasses elements in a sequence as long as a specified condition is true and then returns the remaining elements.
member.typeparam: The type of the elements of source.
member.param: The query to return elements from.
A function to test each element for a condition.
member.returns: A query that contains the elements from the input sequence starting at the first element in the linear series that does not pass the test specified by predicate.

member.name: M:Nessos.LinqOptimizer.CSharp.Extensions.Skip``1(Nessos.LinqOptimizer.Base.IQueryExpr{System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``0}},System.Int32)
member.summary: A query that bypasses a specified number of elements in a sequence and then returns the remaining elements.
member.typeparam: The type of the elements of source.
member.param: A query to return elements from.
The number of elements to skip before returning the remaining elements.
member.returns: A query that returns a sequence containing the elements that occur after the specified index in the input sequence.

member.name: M:Nessos.LinqOptimizer.CSharp.Extensions.ForEach``1(Nessos.LinqOptimizer.Base.IQueryExpr{System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``0}},System.Linq.Expressions.Expression{System.Action{``0}})
member.summary: A query that performs the specified action on each element of the source query.
member.param: An query to return elements from.
The Action delegate to perform on each element of the query.
member.returns: A query that performs the action on each element.

member.name: M:Nessos.LinqOptimizer.CSharp.Extensions.GroupBy``2(Nessos.LinqOptimizer.Base.IQueryExpr{System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``0}},System.Linq.Expressions.Expression{System.Func{``0,``1}})
member.summary: A query that groups the elements of a sequence according to a specified key selector function.
member.typeparam: The type of the elements of source.
The type of the key returned by keySelector.
member.param: A query whose elements to group.
A function to extract the key for each element.
member.returns: A query where each IGrouping element contains a sequence of objects and a key.

member.summary: Creates a query that sorts the elements of a sequence in ascending order according to a key.
member.typeparam: The type of the elements of source.
The type of the key returned by keySelector.
member.param: A query whose values to order.
A function to extract a key from an element.
member.returns: A query whose elements are sorted according to a key.

member.summary: Creates a query that sorts the elements of a sequence in descending order according to a key.

The type of the key returned by keySelector.
member.param: A query whose values to order.
A function to extract a key from an element.
member.returns: A query whose elements are sorted in descending according to a key.

member.summary: A query that generates a sequence by mimicking a for loop.

Loop condition.

member.summary: Creates a new parallel query that projects each element of a sequence to an IEnumerable and flattens the resulting sequences into one sequence.
member.typeparam: The type of the elements of source.
The type of the elements of the sequence returned by selector.
member.param: A query whose values to project.
A transform function to apply to each element.
member.returns: A parallel query whose elements are the result of invoking the one-to-many transform function on each element of the input sequence.

member.summary: Creates a parallel query that projects each element of a sequence to an IEnumerable, flattens the resulting sequences into one sequence, and invokes a result selector function on each element therein.
member.typeparam: The type of the elements of source.
The type of the intermediate elements collected by collectionSelector.
The type of the elements of the sequence returned by selector.
member.param: A query whose values to project.
A transform function to apply to each element of the input sequence.
A transform function to apply to each element of the intermediate sequence.
member.returns: A parallel query whose elements are the result of invoking the one-to-many transform function on each element of the input sequence and the result selector function on each element therein.

member.summary: A parallel query that groups the elements of a sequence according to a specified key selector function.

The type of the key returned by keySelector.
member.param: A query whose elements to group.
A function to extract the key for each element.
